SEARCH

Package operations.mainOperations

package operations.mainOperations
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddEvent
    The AddEvent class implements the Operation interface and handles the addition of a new event to the EventBooker.
    Booking
    The `Booking` class implements the `Operation` interface and handles the "bookings" operation, which involves listing all booked seats for events.
    BookSeat
    The `BookSeat` class implements the `Operation` interface and handles the process of booking a seat for a specific event.
    BuyTicket
    The BuyTicket class implements the Operation interface and handles the purchasing of tickets for a specified event.
    Check
    The Check class implements the Operation interface and handles the validation of ticket codes.
    FreeSeats
    The FreeSeats class implements the Operation interface and handles the retrieval of free seats information for a given event.
    MostFamous
    The `MostFamous` class implements the `Operation` interface and is responsible for identifying the most popular event based on the total number of tickets sold.
    Report
    The Report class implements the Operation interface and generates a report of tickets sold for events within a specified date range.
    StatisticForTenPercent
    The StatisticForTenPercent class is responsible for processing events and performing statistical analysis based on ticket sales.
    UnbookSeat
    The UnbookSeat class implements the Operation interface and provides functionality to unbook a seat for a specific event.
